title: Client cant load

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: When I try launching the client (alpha) a message pops up that says BugSplat.dll is missing. Anyone know how to fix?

replies.body: Reinstalling rn, only time will tell if it works. Will post back to update

Your bugsplat is bugsplatting.  :X  This could be either a program like antivirus causing a block, or your game files may have become corrupted.  If that's the case, you may need to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)to fix this up.  That should fix up your game files and get you back in game.
